document_data.mainbody:
Vanderanus was a Netherese arcanist who performed research at the Shadow Consortium of Eileanar before its destruction in .
Following the disappearance of the institutes founder, Shadow, Vanderanus performed experimental research into the planes as part of Alkinduss project. Focusing on the unlikely possibilities of semiplanes and antiplanes, they worked alongside Janin, Pringle, and Shiris Blamira.
